    ValenciaR

    ValenciaR.Rmd
    library(ValenciaR)
#> Loading required package: magrittr
library(ggplot2)
    
valencia_centroids <- get_Valencia_clusters()
pseudo_valencia_tax_table <- 
  build_Valencia_tax_table(taxa_vec = colnames(valencia_centroids))
    
sample_data <- readRDS("/Users/laurasymul/Dropbox/Gates LACTIN-V/LACTIN-V Data/01_preprocessed/16S_data/LactinV_16S_full_data_phyloseq_2023_01_11.RDS")
input <- sample_data@otu_table %>% as.data.frame()
tax_table <- 
  sample_data@tax_table %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  set_rownames(1:nrow(sample_data@tax_table)) %>% 
  mutate(Domain = Kingdom)

res <- convert_to_Valencia_taxonomy(input = input, tax_table = tax_table)
CSTs <- assign_to_Valencia_clusters(res$converted_input, distance = "YC")

ggplot(CSTs$assignment, aes(x = subCST, fill = CST)) +
  geom_bar() +
  facet_grid(. ~ CST, scales = "free", space = "free") +
  ylab("Number of samples")
